str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am awake (in the night), watch, (b) I am watchful, on the alert, vigilant. From egeiro; to keep awake, i.e. Watch.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
